title: Ukraine grain deal, Ethiopia agreement, show ‘power of multilateralism in action’: Guterres
description: Russia’s decision to rejoin the Black Sea Grain Initiative and the Ethiopian agreement to end the war in Tigray demonstrate the power of multilateralism in action, said the UN chief on Thursday, in a call for countries to also rebuild trust between the North and South at the UN’s COP27 climate conference in Egypt.
source: UN News - Global perspective Human stories
